text: Ezɨ Judan atrivir igiar kam Babilonɨn atrivimɨn akam batuegha, Isipɨn atrivim bagha akam amadagha ghaze, a hoziaba ko mɨdorozir gumazir avɨritaba amadaghtɨ me an akurvaghsɨ izam. Nɨ manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, atrivir igiar kam deravɨra ikiam, o? Puvatɨgham. A Babilonɨn atrivimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim abɨki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Babilonɨn atrivim izɨ pazavɨram a damigham.
